title: What would writing be like in a hundred years? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you think about the present day scenario, then you will see that we are prone to keyboard writing most of the time. Therefore, our handwriting habit is going to oblivion. But one thing is sure that there will be someone who will still to behold the tradition of handwriting habit. In the future, human handwriting will take a new direction which will be based on human mental health and personality. As per the English alphabet's formation is concerned, the lower part of every English alphabet will be little broader, whereas the upper part of the English alphabet’s formation will be a little thinner. It will happen due to the big difference in the mental health of the people at that time. That time, the people will be used to take the tremendous challenges in their life and huge exploration minded. The reason is that at that time, the people will be ready to venture out the outside earth habitat which means the next planet exploration from the earth. Even, the body form and personality will come to reform the new human formation as well. You will find that human will be shorter in size and their handwriting will be shorter but legibility will be sharper which means sharp intelligence. Their handwriting will be a thread-like formation as well. Another thing to ponder that they will lead a faster life than today and their decision-making capability will increase in the bigger perspective. Therefore, the decency of their handwriting will be changed with a different look. You should know that human handwriting depends on the motor control of the human brain. At that time, people will use more brain than their physical stature. More use of the human brain will make it sharper.
Writing would become apocalyptic memoirs, where an AI would have creates furry hentai cat-girls who were now being enslaved.
